definition: arteries and veins/vein (on a leaf, insect wing etc)
to inject/to pour into/to concentrate/to pay attention/stake (gambling)/classifier for sums of money/variant of 註|注[zhu4]

sentences.english: Drug and non-intravenous drug users in these two lines of defense is extremely fragile.
sentences.chinese: 戒毒和不静脉注射毒品这两道防线是极其脆弱的。

sentences.english: Diabetic mouse models were established by intravenous injection of alloxan tetrahydrate.
sentences.chinese: 四氧嘧啶尾静脉注射制作糖尿病小鼠模型。

sentences.english: Anti-cancer drug via oral or intravenous injection into the blood circulation to the body.
sentences.chinese: 抗癌药物可经由口服或静脉注射进入血液循环到全身。

sentences.english: Rapidly after intravenous injection into the extracellular fluid to enter into the cell.
sentences.chinese: 静脉注射后迅速进入细胞外液而不进入细胞内。

sentences.english: Conclusion Ephedrine injected intravenously can decrease the level of anesthesia .
sentences.chinese: 结论静脉注射麻黄碱可减浅麻醉深度。

sentences.english: Some of these are given intravenously, and some of them are tablets.
sentences.chinese: 其中有些是由于静脉注射，他们中的一些是片。

sentences.english: Cholera is easily treated with oral rehydration salts or intravenous fluids.
sentences.chinese: 通过口服补液盐或静脉注射，霍乱是很容易医治的。

sentences.english: Method i. v injection with alloxan.
sentences.chinese: 方法四氧嘧啶尾静脉注射。

sentences.english: Hydroxocobalamin is an effective cyanide antidote when administered intravenously.
sentences.chinese: 静脉注射羟钴胺是一种有效的氰化物解毒方式。

sentences.english: No Jackson fingerprints were found on IV equipment.
sentences.chinese: 在静脉注射管上没有杰克逊的指纹。

sentences.english: Intravenous injection of protamine can reverse the effect of heparin and heparin-like substances on coagulation function.
sentences.chinese: 静脉注射鱼精蛋白可有效逆转此肝素样活动。

sentences.english: Single oral and intravenous studies were conducted in mice and rats.
sentences.chinese: 对小鼠和大鼠进行一次性口服给药和静脉注射的研究。

sentences.english: The patient will be fed intravenously.
sentences.chinese: 这个病人会进行静脉注射。

sentences.english: Patients are dosed once per week for 12 weeks by intravenous infusion.
sentences.chinese: 病人的剂量为12个星期，每周一次静脉注射。

sentences.english: The usual way of curing cholera is to give intravenous saline injections of Ringer solution.
sentences.chinese: 通常治疗霍乱的办法是静脉注射任求氏溶液盐水针。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To prepare garlic oil submicron emulsion for intravenous administration.
sentences.chinese: 目的制备静脉注射用大蒜油亚微乳。
